JiraConnector_Jira_URL.description: The base URL of Jira's API.

JiraConnector_Jira_Label.description: The label to use when getting and posting Jira issues within the specified project (can be empty to get all).

JiraConnector_Jira_User.description: The Jira username to use in the basic authentication.

JiraConnector_Jira_Pass.description: The Jira password to use in the basic authentication.
